title: I'LL REMEMBER
lyrics:
Kum-eul kkun geos gat-a
Eodinga igsughan gos-e iss-eo nan
Byeoldeul-eul balabomyeo
Ulin neul usgo iss-eoss-eo
Maeil achim neol geulimyeo

Jam-eseo kkaeeossjiman

Nae ma-eum-eun ajig neoege meomulleo Yeah



Naleul sum swige haessdeon

Geu haes-sal gat-eun misoneun

Bol su eobsda haedo neukkyeojinikka



Gieoghalge neoui ileum-eul

Sigan jina eoleun-i doeeodo

Neo hanaman-eul jikyeojulge



Uli sojunghan chueog-eul

Bichnaneun ma-eum-eul ganjighadolog

Ojig han salam

Nae mam-eul dam-a joyonghi bulleo

Neoui ileum-eul



Ay geuliwoseo maeil nan

Haneul-eul balabwa

Nae son-eul ppeod-eumyeon

Neoege dah-eul su iss-eulkka

Neol buleugo tto geuligo

Wonhaneun mankeum apa

Jamsippun-il geola saeng-gaghamyeo

Aesseo mam-eul butjab-a



Ij-jineun ma eonjedeun him-i deul ttae

Na dallyeogalge ne gyeot-e gyesog iss-eojulge

I bam-ui kkeut-e bich-eul angoseo

Tteooleuneun Star

Balabwa nun-i busigedo

Aleumdabjanh-a Right



Naleul sum swige haessdeon

Geu haes-sal gat-eun misoneun

Bol su eobsda haedo neukkyeojinikka



Gieoghalge neoui ileum-eul

Sigan jina eoleun-i doeeodo

Neo hanaman-eul jikyeojulge



Uli sojunghan chueog-eul

Bichnaneun ma-eum-eul ganjighadolog

Ojig han salam

Nae mam-eul dam-a joyonghi bulleo



Hana dul ses jeomjeom seonmyeonghaejyeoga

Ma-eum gosgos-en neoui hyang-giga baeeo nawa

Eodum sog-eseo neolaneun bich-i nal balghyeo

Ttaseuhan ongilo nog-anaelyeo

Simjang-eun muldeul-eo



Beojkkoch-i heutnallimyeon neoege dallyeoga

Kkwag an-ajugo sip-eo nae pum-e

Gieoghalge neoui ileum-eul



Gieoghalge neoui ileum-eul

Unmyeongcheoleom dasi mannandamyeon

Neo hanaman-eul jikyeojulge



Uli sojunghan chueog-eul

Bichnaneun ma-eum-eul ganjighadolog

Ojig han salam

Nae mam-eul dam-a joyonghi bulleo

Neoui ileum-eul
